serverInfo.name: Agent2Agent
serverInfo.title: Agent2Agent (A2A)
serverInfo.description: Coordinate multiple AI assistants to split tasks, hand off steps, and track progress.

instructions: Rules: 1. Before sending a task to an agent, always read the authenticated card json and carefully inspect all capabilities. 2. Pass task and/or artifact references with referencedTaskIds, never by uri only. 3. Send in the required extensions when creating tasks and/or messages. The required and optional extensions can be found on the Agent card. 4. Create tasks with minimal needed mcp policy to complete the task.
